clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of Preoperative Nutritional Status on the Postoperative Mortality and Morbidity in Patients Undergoing Valvular Heart Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Preoperative Nutritional Status on the Postoperative Mortality and Morbidity in Patients Undergoing Valvular Heart Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators investigated the clinical impacts of preoperative nutritional status on mortality in patients undergoing valvular heart surgery. Preoperative nutritional status was evaluated by the prognostic nutritional index (PNI), Geriatric Nutritional Risk Index (GNRI), and controlling nutritional status (CONUT) score. The primary outcome was the association between preoperative nutritional status evaluated by PNI, GNRI, and CONUT score and postoperative mortality. The predictive discrimination ability for mortality between PNI, GNRI, and CONUT were compared. Risk factors for mortality were identified.

primary_outcome.measure: postoperative mortality according to peroperative nutritional status
primary_outcome.description: The association between preoperative nutritional status evaluated by the prognostic nutritional index (PNI), Geriatric Nutritional Risk Index (GNRI), and controlling nutritional status (CONUT) score and postoperative mortality is evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: postoperative mortality according to peroperative nutritional status
primary_outcome.description: The association between preoperative nutritional status evaluated by the prognostic nutritional index (PNI), Geriatric Nutritional Risk Index (GNRI), and controlling nutritional status (CONUT) score and postoperative mortality is evaluated.

secondary_outcome.measure: predictive discrimination ability for mortality between PNI, GNRI, and CONUT
secondary_outcome.description: The predictive discrimination abilities for mortality between PNI, GNRI, and CONUT score are compared.

secondary_outcome.measure: predictive discrimination ability for mortality between PNI, GNRI, and CONUT
secondary_outcome.description: The predictive discrimination abilities for mortality between PNI, GNRI, and CONUT score are compared.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing valvular heart disease
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients younger than 18 years
- Patients undergoing combined congenital heart surgery

facility.name: Department of Anesthesiology and Pain Medicine, Yonsei University College of Medicine
